title.rendered: "Creating Digi​ ​Mums – digital literacy for mums is the need of the hour" – Vaibhav Vats

content.rendered:
“Creating Digi Mums – digital literacy for mums is the need of the hour”

 

The prominent online publication – YourStory – has featured Digiperform on the occasion of Mother’s Day, on 13th May 2018.

The publication has carried the authored article by Vaibhav Vats, Co-founder of Digiperform on “Creating Digi Mums – digital literacy for mums is the need of the hour” under the section ‘Herstory’.

Coverage Details:

Headline- Creating Digimums- digital literacy for mums is the need of the hour

Portal- YourStory

Edition- Online

Date- May 13th,2018

Link- https://yourstory.com/2018/05/creating-digimoms-digital-literacy-moms-need-hour/

excerpt.rendered: The prominent online publication – YourStory – has featured Digiperform on the occasion of Mother’s Day, on 13th May 2018.
